body_html:
Thanks @gchanan ! I've restructured the commits and push --force. Sorry for causing these inconvenience. In my other PR (adaptive max pool 3d), I tried to follow your advice and structure them better. So that one should be much easier to review :).

Let me know if there is anything more I need to change!

body:
Thanks @gchanan ! I've restructured the commits and `push --force`. Sorry for causing these inconvenience. In my other PR (adaptive max pool 3d), I tried to follow your advice and structure them better. So that one should be much easier to review :). 

Let me know if there is anything more I need to change!
